StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetProfessedExamHistory]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@PersonId int AS
SELECT CONVERT(CHAR(11), CPE.EXAM_DATE, 106) AS EXAM_DATE, PE.PROFESSED_EXAM_SHORT_DESC, CPE.EXAM_SCORE, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CPE.EXAM_SCORE2), SPACE(0)) AS EXAM_SCORE2, COALESCE(CONVERT(VARCHAR(4), CPE.EXAM_SCORE3), SPACE(0)) AS EXAM_SCORE3, CPE.EXAM_ENTERED_DATE, CPE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE FROM CANDIDATE_PROFESSED_EXAM CPE INNER JOIN PROFESSED_EXAM PE ON (CPE.MARINE_CANDIDATE_ID = @PersonId AND CPE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE = PE.PROFESSED_EXAM_TYPE)
